snippet.title: [MSX2] Darwin 4078 - Longplay
snippet.description:
Darwin 4078 / ダーウィン４０７８ (MSX)

(C) 1987 Data East / Hudson Soft

------------------------------­­--------­--­­-----------------­-­----------------­-----­-­----­--­-

Notes:
======
- This is a port of Darwin 4078 arcade game, originally developed by Data East. The MSX2 port was handled by Hudson Soft.

- Darwin 4078 got an arcade sequel titled "SRD: Super Real Darwin". SEGA remade it for Mega Drive as "Darwin 4081".

- Evolution chart for the MSX2 version can be found from here: https://imgur.com/a/TImIw6E
